name: smsshcss
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/cli.ts --format cjs --tsconfig tsconfig.json && cp src/reset.css dist/ && mkdir -p dist/templates && cp templates/* dist/templates/
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts src/cli.ts --format cjs --watch --tsconfig tsconfig.json && cp src/reset.css dist/ && mkdir -p dist/templates && cp templates/* dist/templates/
